ABOUT THE CONFERENCE

Non Profit

@Swift is a non profit conference organized by @Conf team. All incomes will be used for the conference itself, including space expenses, travel fee for speakers and participants' benefits.

DEV to DEV

@Swift is a tech feast made by developers for developers. We are developers just like you, what you are looking for is also our main goal.

High Quality

All of our speakers and subjects are strictly chosen in order to make sure you get the best experience.

SPEAKERS

CHRIS EIDHOF

Chris is a Dutch software developer living in Berlin (Germany). He spends most of his time building iOS and Mac apps, such as Deckset and Scenery. He started UIKonf, objc.io, wrote a book about Functional Programming in Swift and is currently writing a book on Advanced Swift.

SAM SOFFES

Sam is a developer & designer. Some of the notable apps he’s worked on include Tiiny, Litely, Cheddar, Hipstamatic, and Bible. He lives in San Francisco and rides his motorcycle as much as possible. You can find him on Twitter or GitHub as @soffes.

WEI WANG

@onevcat, also know as '喵神(Cat God)', is an iOS and Unity3D developer. Wang lives in Japan and work for Line now. He is the author of *Swifter - 100 Swift necessary tips*.

JIEXIN LI

Former iOS developer at News Application of NetEase. He was the founder of the very first Swift online community in China - swiftist.org. Starting to use Swift in productive environment in October 2014, he developed the English learning application Listen+.

~3 MORE SPEAKERS TO BE ANNOUNCED

SUBJECTS

  • New features in Swift 2
  • The open source of Swift and it's impact on developers
  • Best practices of migrating from Objective-C to Swift
  • How to learn Swift

TICKET

Holding a high-quality conference not only requires energy but also needs money Everything will not be able to run without enough financial support, so we are raising money through various ways.

For @Swift, tickets is our main income, we really need your support!

Why should I pay for @Swift?

  • This is the VERY FIRST Swift conference in China
  • You can communicate with best speakers from all over the world
  • We will release the video after the conference, but without the Q&A part - you must come to listen and ask
  • Meeting with hundreds of developers who REALLY LOVE Swift
  • All of our incomes will be used for supporting the conference, you are the real host of this conference!

So, will you support us?

YES!
